data.header: Software engineer with a focus in full-stack development, human-computer interactions, and cloud computing.
detail: Beyond my passions in exploring the intersection of computational systems and social interaction, other areas of interest are in machine learning and building for the Blockchain.
🎊 completing my undergraduate degree in computer science at **[uc santa cruz](https://engineering.ucsc.edu/)**, class of 2021
💪 leading teams at **[tech4good](https://tech4good.soe.ucsc.edu/#/people)** and building supportive **[online communites](https://discord.gg/zPqvrFeMAf)**

🌐 creating **[dapps](https://ethereum.org/en/dapps/#what-are-dapps)** and **[smart contracts](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/smart-contracts/)** using react.js, redux observable, and solidity++
